properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:51AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...Oliver Lock and Dam...and Selden Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall during the past 24 hours continues to produce rises
and flooding along the Black Warrior River basin...a flood warning
remains in effect for the Black Warrior River at Holt Lock and Dam,
Selden Lock and Dam, Oliver Lock and Dam, and the Locust Fork at Sayre.
Moderate flooding is forecast to occur at Selden Lock and Dam which may
lead to residential flooding in the surrounding area.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  9:30 AM Tuesday the stage was 100.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 103.7 feet by
early Friday afternoon then begin falling.
* Impact...At 102 feet...Residential flooding begins in the area.
Numerous cabins and trailers in Hale and Greene counties become
flooded. At 98 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood. At 94 feet...Some secondary roads in the area
begin to flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. At
90 feet...Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock
should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
